This was a time of pioneers... unfortunately things seem to get more somber every day as anti-scientific reactionaries are winning more and more ground also among the ignorant masses. 

Well, maybe it's time for us ecologists to return to the 'counter-culture' and the 'underground' and let the mainstream again coughing the lungs out of their chests because of smog.
